place_of_publication.publication_title: in A. Cronquist et al., Intermount. Fl.

treatment.description: Plants 1–2+ dm. Stems mostly arching upward. Leaves usually smaller than 4 × 2 cm, bases not clasping, margins notably laciniate to laciniate-toothed or -lobed (the lobes sometimes also toothed). Heads 1–2(–4). Phyllaries (± 8) ± 13, 7–10 mm.
